We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private MassIndex _mass;
// In Initialize()
_mass = MASS(symbol,);

// In OnData()
if (_mass.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "MASS Is Ready", _mass.IsReady);
    Plot("My Indicators", "MASS Warm Up Period", _mass.WarmUpPeriod);
    Plot("My Indicators", "MASS Current", _mass.Current);
    Plot("My Indicators", "MASS Name", _mass.Name);
    Plot("My Indicators", "MASS Samples", _mass.Samples);
}
# In Initialize()
self.mass = self.MASS(symbol,)

# In OnData()
if self.mass.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "MASS Is Ready", self.mass.IsReady);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "MASS Warm Up Period", self.mass.WarmUpPeriod);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "MASS Current", self.mass.Current);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "MASS Name", self.mass.Name);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "MASS Samples", self.mass.Samples);
}
